meanings.definition: A curve generated by the intersection of a plane with a right circular cone at an angle with the axis greater than the angle of the side of the cone.
meanings.sent1: The artist drew intricate cissoids on the paper.
meanings.sent2: Mathematicians study the properties of cissoids in geometry.
meanings.sent3: The cissoids at the edge of the drawing seemed to dance playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed cissoids, intersecting at unexpected points.
meanings.sent5: The cissoids in the textbook illustration were clear and easy to understand.

meanings.sent2: Students learned about the cissoids of Diocles in their math class.
meanings.sent3: The cissoids in the problem looked like playful loops on the graph.
